trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies scope of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" /> as a page, document, or sequence of documents.
trans-unit.target: Valeur d'énumération qui spécifie la portée de <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" /> en tant que page, document ou séquence de documents.

trans-unit.source: Based on the scope of defined by <c>printTicketLevel</c>, the number of pages or the number of documents associated with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" />.
trans-unit.target: En fonction de l’étendue définie par <c>printTicketLevel</c>, nombre de pages ou de documents associés à <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default printer settings to use when the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: Obtient ou définit les paramètres de l'imprimante par défaut à utiliser pour l'impression du document.

trans-unit.source: The default printer settings to use when the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: Paramètres de l'imprimante par défaut à utiliser pour l'impression du document.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Définition de la <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> propriété ne pas valider ou modifier le texte spécifié <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> en tant <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a given printer.
trans-unit.target: Si nécessaire, utilisez la méthode <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> pour créer un <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> spécifique à la <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> et valide pour l'imprimante donnée.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the scope of the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtient une valeur qui indique la portée de l'événement <see cref="E:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired" />.

trans-unit.source: An enumeration that indicates the scope of the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired" /> event as for a sequence of documents, a single document, or a single page.
trans-unit.target: Énumération qui indique la portée de l'événement <see cref="E:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired" /> pour une séquence de documents, une seule page ou un seul document.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel.FixedDocumentSequencePrintTicket>, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of documents output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Lorsque le <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> propriété est <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel.FixedDocumentSequencePrintTicket>, le <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> propriété spécifie le nombre de documents imprimés avec le <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> values, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pour d’autres <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> valeurs, le <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> propriété spécifie le nombre de pages en sortie avec la <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of documents or pages output with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtient le nombre de pages ou de documents imprimé(e)s avec <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of documents or pages output with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" />.
trans-unit.target: Nombre de pages ou de documents imprimé(e)s avec <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" />.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel.FixedDocumentSequencePrintTicket>, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of documents output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Lorsque le <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> propriété est <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel.FixedDocumentSequencePrintTicket>, le <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> propriété spécifie le nombre de documents imprimés avec le <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> values, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pour d’autres <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> valeurs, le <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> propriété spécifie le nombre de pages en sortie avec la <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
